dct_title_s: Map of the route from Badakshan across the Pamir-Steppe to Kashgar, with the southern branch of the Upper Oxus from the survey made by the Mirza in 1868-69, to accompany the paper by Major T. G. Montgomerie, R.E.; F.R.G.S.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. Major mountain ranges are shown. The Mirza's route shown in red. From: The Journal of the Royal Geographical Society of London. Vol. 41 (1871), pp. 132-93; held in Firestone Library. Call number: G7 .J687
dct_publisher_sm: London : published for the Journal of the Royal Geographical Society, by J. Murray, Albemarle Street, 1871.
